apps.name: Scribble Notes
apps.shortDescription: Secure, organized note-taking with scribble support.
apps.fullDescription: Scribble Notes is a feature-rich note-taking application designed for privacy and organization. With features like nested folders, app lock, rich text editing, and a unique frame-based scribble pad, it keeps your ideas secure and structured.

sections.title: Fast, clean list view
sections.content: A streamlined dashboard for all your thoughts. The Home screen brings all your notes and checklists together in a clean list or grid view. Easily verify, pin, archive, or categorize your notes right from the main screen, keeping your most important ideas always within reach.

sections.title: Find notes in seconds
sections.content: Instantly locate any note, checklist, or folder. The intelligent search bar filters results as you type, highlighting matching keywords in titles and descriptions. Smart breadcrumbs show exactly where each note lives, so you never lose track of your ideas.

sections.title: Quick & secure access
sections.content: Keep your private thoughts truly private. Set up a secure passcode to lock the app or protect specific sensitive notes. Your data stays local and secure, ensuring only you have access to your personal information.

sections.title: Organize your life without limits
sections.content: Organize your life without limits. Create main categories and deep sub-categories to keep your workspace perfectly structured. Whether it's "Personal > Finance > April" or "Work > Projects > Ideas," you can nest folders as deep as you need.

sections.title: Match your device colors
sections.content: A personal experience that adapts to you. Choose from various themes, including dynamic Material You support that syncs with your device's wallpaper palette. Switch between distinct "OLED Dark" and "Light" modes for visual comfort in any environment.

sections.title: Structure and Flexibility
sections.content: An editor designed for structure and flexibility. Build your notes using distinct blocks for paragraphs, headers, checklists, and code snippets. Drag and drop to reorder sections instantly, and enrich your notes with photos, audio recordings, and formatting effortlessly.

sections.title: Frame-by-frame animation sketching
sections.content: A digital canvas for your creativity. More than just a drawing tool, it supports frame-by-frame animation sketching and "playback" to review your thought process. Create multi-page sketches, correct mistakes with non-destructive erasing, and bring your visual ideas to life.

sections.title: Make the app yours
sections.content: We believe in total transparency. We request access only when necessary: **Camera** for taking photos, **Storage** for saving your backups and media, **Network** for cloud syncing, and **Notifications** for your timely reminders. You stay in control of your data.

sections.title: Core Technology
sections.content: Scribble Notes is built using **Flutter**, Google's UI toolkit for building natively compiled applications. It ensures high performance and smooth (60fps) animations on Android.

sections.title: Design Patterns
sections.content: The app follows **Clean Architecture** principles, with a clear separation of concerns. State management is handled by **Bloc** (Business Logic Component), ensuring predictable state changes and easy testing.

sections.title: Data Deletion & Retention

### Usage Data
We retain collected Usage Data for a limited period for internal analysis to improve Service functionality.

Since Scribble Notes is an offline-first application, most data resides solely on your device. You can delete all your data by:
1.  **Uninstalling the Application**: This immediately and permanently deletes all local database files.
2.  **Deleting Backups**: If you enabled Cloud Sync, you can delete your backup data by navigating to your Google Drive Settings -> Manage Apps -> Scribble Notes -> Options -> "Delete hidden app data".

If you have shared any personal data with us directly (e.g., via email support), you may request its deletion by contacting us at **ni.studio.us@outlook.com**.

apps.name: SMS Stack
apps.fullDescription:
SMS Stack is a modern Flutter application designed to declutter your inbox and provide intelligent financial insights—without your data ever leaving your device. It automatically categorizes messages into "Personal", "Finance", and "Promos", extracts transaction details to build a financial dashboard, and helps you stay on top of bill payments.

Built with a "Privacy First" philosophy, all processing happens locally using a custom Regex engine. There are no external API calls for message analysis, ensuring your financial data remains secure on your phone.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: The SMS Parser Engine is the core component that gives SMS Stack its intelligence. It runs entirely on your device, reading incoming messages and applying a sophisticated set of rules to understand their context—whether it's a bank transaction, a bill reminder, or just a chat from a friend.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content:
The engine uses a "Waterfall" approach to parsing:
1.  **Normalization**: First, sender IDs are cleaned (e.g., `+91-HDFCBK` becomes `HDFCBK`).
2.  **Global Matching**: It checks against universal patterns like OTPs (`\d{4-8}`) or Account Numbers.
3.  **Regional Rules**: It applies country-specific logic (currently optimized for `IN` - India) to interpret currency symbols (`₹`, `INR`), date formats, and transaction keywords (`credited`, `debited`).
4.  **Extraction**: If a match is found, it extracts:
    *   **Amount**: The transaction value.
    *   **Type**: Credit (Income), Debit (Expense), or Bill.
    *   **Entity**: The Bank or Merchant name (resolved via alias lists).

sections.title: User Benefits
sections.content:
*   **100% Privacy**: No data leaves your phone. Unlike other apps that upload SMS to a server, our regex engine runs locally.
*   **Offline Capable**: Works perfectly without an internet connection.
*   **Instant**: Parsing happens in milliseconds as soon as an SMS arrives.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: The Finance Dashboard turns your chaotic SMS inbox into a clear financial summary. By aggregating transaction alerts from banks and wallets, it provides a real-time view of your liquidity and spending without needing to log into multiple banking apps.

sections.title: Key Capabilities
sections.content:
*   **Smart Balance**: Shows the latest "Available Balance" extracted from your most recent bank SMS.
*   **Income vs Expense**: Monthly breakdown of how much came in vs how much went out.
*   **Spend Analysis**: Visual charts showing daily spending trends.
*   **Bill Tracking**: Identifies "Payment Due" messages and lists them separately so you never miss a deadline.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: The Smart Inbox is your primary interface for viewing messages. Unlike a standard SMS app, it doesn't just list everything chronologically—it organizes them.

sections.title: Features
sections.content:
*   **Tabbed View**:
    *   **Personal**: Conversations with people (non-commercial).
    *   **Transactions**: Bank alerts, OTPs, and bills.
    *   **Promos**: Marketing spam and offers.
*   **Sender Mapping**:
    *   Automatically converts cryptic IDs like `VM-HDFCBK` to "HDFC Bank".
    *   Allows you to set your own Custom Names for senders.
*   **Powerful Search**:
    *   Search by text content ("Amazon").
    *   Search by amount ("5000").
    *   Search by time/date.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Your inbox is full of "Due Date" reminders, but they get lost in the noise. SMS Stack automatically detects these messages and separates them into a dedicated view, effectively turning your SMS inbox into a Bill Calendar.

sections.title: What it Does
sections.content:
*   **Auto-Detection**: Scans messages for keywords like "Due on", "Pay by", and "Bill amount".
*   **Calendar Sorting**: Organizes bills by their due date, showing the most urgent ones effectively.
*   **Reminders**: Can optionally schedule a local notification 1-3 days before the due date (Beta).

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: SMS Stack includes a proactive Spam Defense system designed to keep your Personal and Transaction tabs clean without deleting important messages.

sections.title: Features
sections.content:
*   **Spam Suggestions**: The app analyzes frequency and content models to identify likely spammers (e.g., "AD-123456"). It smartly excludes senders who also send OTPs or Finance alerts (like Banks) to prevent false positives.
*   **Block List**: You can block specific senders. Their messages will be hidden from the main inbox and they won't trigger notifications.
*   **Dismissal**: If the app suggests a sender incorrectly, you can "Dismiss" the suggestion, and it won't bother you again.

sections.title: Navigation
sections.content:
1.  Go to **Settings** -> **Spam Manager**.
2.  **Suggestions Tab**: Review potential spam. Tap "Block" to banish them or "Dismiss" to keep them.
3.  **Blocked Tab**: See who you've blocked. You can unblock them anytime.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Sender IDs like `VM-SBIINB` or `BZ-AMZPAY` are cryptic and not user friendly. Sender Mapping allows you to convert these into readable names like "SBI Bank" or "Amazon Pay".

sections.title: How it Works
sections.content:
*   **Auto-Resolution**: The app comes with a built-in dictionary for hundreds of popular Indian banks and services (HDFC, ICICI, Fliplart, Zomato, etc.).
*   **User Overrides**: You can define your own names. If you get messages from a local gym or school with a weird ID, you can rename it permanently.
*   **Sync**: Your custom mappings are synced to your Cloud Backup, so you don't lose them when you switch phones.

sections.title: How to Use
sections.content:
1.  Go to **Settings** -> **Operations** -> **Sender Mapping**.
2.  Tap **"Add New"** (+).
3.  Select the Sender ID from the dropdown (grouped by prefix).
4.  Enter the Display Name.
5.  Save. All past and future messages will now show the new name.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Protect your financial history and organization rules by backing them up to your personal Google Drive.

sections.title: Security First
sections.content:
*   **End-to-End Encryption**: Your backup file is encrypted on your device using **AES-256-GCM** before it is uploaded.
*   **Key Security**: The encryption key is derived from a password you set. We (the developers) never see your password or your data.
*   **Private Storage**: The file is stored in a hidden "App Data" folder in your Google Drive. It is not visible to other apps or even to you directly, preventing accidental deletion.

sections.title: Features
sections.content:
*   **What is Backed Up?**
    *   Sms Stack categorization (Personal/Finance/Promo).
    *   Sender Mappings (Your custom names).
    *   App Settings & Preferences.
*   **Frequency**: Set it to run Daily or Weekly in the background.

sections.title: How to Setup
sections.content:
1.  Go to **Settings** -> **Data Control**.
2.  Tap **"Backup & Restore"**.
3.  Sign in with Google.
4.  Set an Encryption Password.
5.  Tap **"Sync Now"**.

sections.title: Managing Your Data
sections.content:
You retain full control over your cloud data. To delete it permanently:
1.  Go to [drive.google.com/drive/settings](https://drive.google.com/drive/settings).
2.  Click **Manage Apps** on the left.
3.  Find **SMS Stack**.
4.  Click **Options** -> **Delete hidden app data**.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Customize the look and feel of the app to match your preference.

sections.title: Theme Engine
sections.content:
*   **System Default**: Matches your Android system theme (Light/Dark).
*   **Dark Mode**: A generic easeful dark theme for low-light usage (High Contrast).
*   **Light Mode**: A clean, crisp interface for daytime usage.

sections.title: Operations
sections.content:
Go to **Settings** -> **Operations** to manage data:
*   **Storage Optimization**: Auto-delete old OTPs (Older than 24h, 3 days, etc.) to save space.
*   **Full Resync**: If you feel the parser missed something, you can trigger a "Factory Reset" of the local database to re-read all SMS from scratch (without losing personal data).

sections.title: Available Features
sections.content:
1.  **Biometric Lock**: Secure the app with your Fingerprint or Face ID. Requires authentication every time you open the app.
2.  **Smart Bill Reminders**: Receive a phone notification 2 days before a bill is due. (Requires 'Alarm' permission).
3.  **Visual Analytics (Alpha)**: A deeper dive into your spending with Pie Charts and Bar Graphs (sender-wise breakdown).

sections.title: SMS & Contacts
sections.content:
To function as an SMS Organizer, we request specific permissions:
*   **Read SMS (`READ_SMS`)**: Used to categorize messages and extract transaction details. **Local Only**.
*   **Receive SMS (`RECEIVE_SMS`)**: Required to detect and process new incoming messages in real-time.
*   **Send SMS (`SEND_SMS`)**: Required for sending replies directly from the app's notification or UI.
*   **Read Contacts (`READ_CONTACTS`)**: Used to display contact names and photos for better identification. **In-Memory Only**.
*   **Read Phone State (`READ_PHONE_STATE`)**: Used to detect Multi-SIM information (Slot 1 vs Slot 2) for organizing messages properly.

sections.title: System Integrations
sections.content:
*   **Notifications (`POST_NOTIFICATIONS`)**: Required to post alerts for new messages.
*   **Alarms (`SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM`)**: Required to schedule precise notifications for Bill Due Dates.
*   **Biometric (`USE_BIOMETRIC`)**: Used for the App Lock feature to secure your data.
*   **Vibration (`VIBRATE`)**: Used for tactile feedback on notifications.
*   **Boot Completed (`RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED`)**: Required to restart our processing service (listeners) after you restart your phone.

sections.title: Network Usage
sections.content:
*   **Internet (`INTERNET`)**: The app uses internet access **strictly** for:
    1.  Fetching parser rule updates (Firebase Remote Config).
    2.  Performing encrypted backups (Google Drive API).
    3.  **No SMS data is ever sent to our servers.**

sections.title: High-Level Overview
sections.content:
SMS Stack follows **Clean Architecture** principles, separating the codebase into three main layers:

1.  **Presentation Layer (`lib/features/`)**:
    *   **UI**: Widgets/Screens.
    *   **State Management**: `Bloc` (Business Logic Components).
2.  **Domain/Service Layer (`lib/core/services/`)**:
    *   **Services**: `SmsService`, `NotificationService`, `PermissionService`.
    *   **Logic**: `SmsParserEngine` (Regex Logic).
3.  **Data Layer (`lib/core/database/`)**:
    *   **Database**: Drift (SQLite) with FTS5.
    *   **DTOs**: `SmsMessage` (from system) -> `Message` (db entity).

sections.title: Core Patterns
sections.content:
*   **BLoC Pattern**: Used for Predictable State Management. Uses `hydrated_bloc` to persist UI state.
*   **Dependency Injection**: Uses `get_it` and `injectable` for managing singletons.
*   **Repository Pattern**: `SmsService` abstracts the data source.

sections.title: Schema Structure
sections.content:
The parsing logic is defined in `assets/rules/sms_rules.json`. It follows a hierarchical "Waterfall" structure:
*   **Global Rules**: Universal patterns like OTPs or Account Numbers.
*   **Regional Rules (IN)**: Country-specific logic for currency (`₹`), date formats, and keywords.
*   **Extraction Strategy**: Priority order: Bill > Debit/Credit > Balance > OTP.

sections.title: Encryption Standards
sections.content:
*   **Algorithm**: AES-256-GCM.
*   **Key Derivation**: PBKDF2 with 10,000 iterations.
*   **Salt**: Random 16-byte salt per file.

sections.title: Process
sections.content:
1. Serialize SQLite tables to JSON.
2. GZIP Compress.
3. Encrypt with User Password.
4. Upload to Google Drive `appDataFolder` (Hidden).

sections.title: Algorithm
sections.content:
Identifies spammers based on:
1.  **Category**: Classified as `Promo/Spam`.
2.  **No Critical History**: No Finance/Bill/OTP messages.
3.  **Frequency**: High volume.
4.  **Exclusion**: Not in Contacts.

sections.title: Integration
sections.content:
Uses a `BroadcastReceiver` (Kotlin) to intercept SMS, parse them, and post notifications using `MessagingStyle`. 
*   **Flutter Bridge**: Syncs read state and notifications via `MethodChannel`.

sections.title: SMS & Contacts

*   **Send SMS (`SEND_SMS`)**: Required for sending replies directly from the app's notification or UI.

sections.title: Parsing (Regex Engine)
sections.content: When an SMS is received, it is processed by the on-device `SmsParserEngine`. This engine uses a set of Regular Expression rules to identify patterns (like "INR 500 debited"). This processing happens **entirely in your phone's secure memory**.

sections.title: Storage (SQLite)
sections.content: All extracted data (Accounts, Transactions, Bills, Logs) is stored in a private `SQLite` database located in the app's secure sandbox. Other apps cannot access this data.

sections.title: Google Drive Sync
sections.content:
If you enable Cloud Backup:
1.  Your data is serialized to JSON and GZIP compressed.
2.  Data is **End-to-End Encrypted** (AES-256-GCM) locally before upload using a key derived from your custom password.
3.  The encrypted file is uploaded to a hidden `appDataFolder` in your Google Drive.
**We cannot decrypt or read your data.**

**To Delete Cloud Data**:
1. Go to [drive.google.com/drive/settings](https://drive.google.com/drive/settings) -> **Manage Apps**.
2. Find **SMS Stack** -> **Options** -> **Delete hidden app data**.

sections.title: Firebase Config
sections.content: We use Firebase Remote Config to push updates to the SMS parsing rules. This service may collect basic metadata (Instance ID, IP Address) for service delivery, but it **does not** access your SMS content.

sections.title: User Control
sections.content:
*   **Access**: You have full access to view all processed data within the app.
*   **Erasure**: Uninstalling the app instantly and permanently deletes all local data. You can delete cloud backups via your Google Drive settings.
*   **Breach Notification**: In the unlikely event of a local data breach (e.g., OS compromise), we will notify you via app notification if technically feasible.
